description: Assisting the Iraqi Police with capacity building to ensure the integrity, professionalism and discipline of the police focusing on building institutional capacity, promoting public awareness and confidence in the Iraqi Police Service.

subproject.description:
1. Iraq Police Service (IPS) capacity to develop strategic and budgeting plans strengthened
2. Firearms registration conducted Al-Basrah-wide
3. Community policing introduced in two locations in Al-Basrah
4. A new independent public complaint mechanism is advocated
subproject.title: Law Enforcement Capacity Build

title: Law Enforcement Capacity Building.-Basrah
